features.name: Initialize Git repository
features.description: Initialize git repo with .gitignore for Node.js/TypeScript project
steps: Run git init in project directory

test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify .git folder exists and .gitignore is properly configured

features.name: Initialize package.json
features.description: Create package.json with project metadata and scripts
steps: Run npm init or create package.json manually
Add scripts for dev, build, test, lint

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm install and verify no errors

features.name: Configure TypeScript
features.description: Set up TypeScript with strict configuration
steps: Create tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled
Configure paths, outDir, and module resolution

test_instructions.manual_verification: Create test .ts file and compile successfully

features.name: Configure ESLint and Prettier
features.description: Set up linting and formatting tools
steps: Add lint and format scripts to package.json

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm run lint and npm run format

features.name: Set up project directory structure
features.description: Create folder structure for src, tests, config
steps: Create src/ with subdirs: api, detection, ui, notifications, ai, utils

test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify all directories exist with correct structure

features.name: Configure environment variables
features.description: Set up dotenv and environment configuration
steps: Create config/env.ts for typed env access

test_instructions.unit: Test env.ts loads and validates variables
test_instructions.manual_verification: Copy .env.example to .env and verify app loads

features.name: Set up testing framework
features.description: Configure Jest or Vitest for testing
steps: Create sample test to verify setup

test_instructions.unit: Run npm test to execute sample test
test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify test output shows passing test

features.name: Set up database with Prisma
features.description: Initialize Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npx prisma db push to verify connection

features.name: Set up Next.js frontend
features.description: Initialize Next.js with App Router

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm run dev and verify app loads at localhost:3000

features.name: Configure Tailwind CSS
features.description: Set up Tailwind CSS for styling

test_instructions.manual_verification: Add Tailwind class to component and verify styling

features.name: Gamma API client initialization
features.description: Initialize HTTP client for Polymarket Gamma API with base URL and headers
steps: Install axios or use fetch wrapper
Configure base URL and default headers

test_instructions.manual_verification: Make test request to Gamma API

features.name: Fetch all active markets
features.description: Retrieve list of all currently active prediction markets

test_instructions.unit: Mock API response and test parsing
test_instructions.e2e: Call live API and verify response structure

features.name: Fetch market by ID
features.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific market by its ID

test_instructions.unit: Test with valid and invalid IDs
test_instructions.e2e: Fetch known market and verify data

features.name: Fetch market by slug
features.description: Retrieve market information using URL slug identifier
steps: Parse slug from URL if needed

test_instructions.unit: Test slug parsing and API call

features.name: Fetch market outcomes
features.description: Get all possible outcomes and their current probabilities for a market
steps: Define Outcome interface with probability field
Parse outcome data from API response

features.name: Fetch market volume history
features.description: Retrieve historical volume data for a specific market
steps: Accept market ID and time range

features.name: Fetch market price history
features.description: Get historical price/probability data for market outcomes
steps: Accept market ID, outcome, and time range

test_instructions.e2e: Fetch price history for known market

features.name: Fetch markets by category
features.description: Filter and retrieve markets by category (politics, sports, crypto, etc.)

features.name: Fetch trending markets
features.description: Get list of markets with highest recent activity
steps: Sort by recent volume or activity

features.name: Gamma API pagination handler
features.description: Handle paginated responses for large data sets
steps: Support automatic fetching of all pages

test_instructions.unit: Test pagination logic with mocked responses

features.name: Gamma API rate limiter
features.description: Implement rate limiting to avoid API throttling

test_instructions.e2e: Make rapid requests and verify throttling

features.name: Gamma API error handler
features.description: Handle API errors with retry logic and exponential backoff

test_instructions.unit: Test retry logic with mock failures

features.name: Gamma API response caching
features.description: Cache frequently accessed data to reduce API calls
